contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Vodafone Qatar Rated As Premium Operator for Their Roaming Services by the GSMA Association

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Vodafone Qatar has been rated as a Premium Operator for their roaming services by the GSMA Association.The GSMA Association represents the interests of mobile operators worldwide, uniting nearly 800 operators with more than 250 companies in the broader mobile ecosystem, including handset and device makers, software companies, equipment providers and Internet companies, as well as organizations in adjacent industry sectors.

Mohamed Al Sadah, Chief Operating Officer, Vodafone Qatar commented: “We are delighted to be recognized by GSMA for our premier roaming standard. At Vodafone, we know how important it is for customers to have high-quality roaming services allowing them to confidently connect abroad. Vodafone globally maintains a leading roaming position and thanks to being part of Vodafone Group Plc, the world’s largest network, we here in Qatar are able to give our customers the widest roaming footprint and the widest 4G coverage.”

In fact, customers can rest assured that they will be covered in the air with Vodafone’s roaming services on more than 20 international airlines. In fact, with the ocean covering 70% of the planet, when customers sail with Vodafone they will able to call, SMS and send mails with Vodafone Maritime roaming services. On top of this, Vodafone’s Passport pack supports roaming in 45 countries for just QR100 a week.

For the full story, please click here.
